description.other_contributors: Koray Atalag, University of Auckland, New Zealand

details.purpose: To record detailed findings about lung cancer found on microscopic histopathological examination.
details.use: To record detailed findings about microscopic examination of tissue related to lung cancer. Use as a component archetype in the context of a suite of archetypes that make up a histopathology report i.e. OBSERVATION.lab_test.histopathology.
details.misuse: Not designed to be used within any other archetype other than OBSERVATION.lab_test.histopathology.

description.other_details:
The Royal College of Pathologists. Dataset for lung cancer histopathology reports [Internet]. 2007 Sep ;[cited 2009 Jul 27 ] Available from: http://www.rcpath.org/index.asp?PageID=1159
College of American Pathologists. Histopathology Lung protocol [Internet]. [cited 2009 Jul 27 ] Available from: http://www.cap.org/apps/docs/committees/cancer/cancer_protocols/2005/lung05_pw.pdf
Royal College of Pathologists of Australasia. Lung Cancer Structured Reporting Protocol (1st Edition 2010). [Internet]. 2010;[cited 2010 Mar 21 ] Available from: http://www.rcpa.edu.au//static/File/Asset%20library/public%20documents/Publications/StructuredReporting/LUNG%20CANCER%20STRUCTURED%20PATHOLOGY%20REPORTING%20PROTOCOL%20for%20web.pdf

items.items: Microscopic anatomical pathology findings related to lung cancer.
Findings related to the lymph node involvement by tumour.
A text description of additional histopathological findings.
Details of direct invasion of local tissue by tumour.
Findings related to bronchial surgical resection margin.
Details of bronchial surgical resection margin.
Findings of an additional histopathological finding.
Presence of in-situ carcinoma has not been determined.
A text description of in-situ carcinoma.
Findings related to local tissue invasion.
Details of visceral pleural invasion by tumour.
Details of arterial invasion by tumour.
Details of venous invasion by tumour.
Details of lymphatic invasion by tumour.
Details of perineural invasion by tumour.
Findings related to vascular surgical resection margin.
Details of vascular surgical resection margin.
If the vascular margin is involved by tumour, the nature of that involvement.
Tumour thrombus present in the lumen of the vessel
Tumour thrombus is present in the lumen of the vessel.
Vessel wall is involved by tumour.
The nature of vascular involvement at the resection margin has not been determined.
If the bronchial margin is involved by tumour, the nature of that involvement.
Invasive carcinoma involvement of the bronchial margin.
In-situ carcinoma involvement of the bronchial margin.
The nature of bronchial margin involvement has not been determined.
If the tumour is invasive, the extent of invasion at the bronchial resection margin.
Invasion at the bronchial margin is limited to bronchial tissue.
Invasion at the bronchial margin infiltrates per-bronchial soft tissue.
Extent of invasion at bronchial margin has not been determined.
Findings related to other resection margins.
